title: Noam Chomsky on Just War
description:
Here, Chomsky gives a lecture on the limitations of Just War theory. 

Noam Chomsky on Innate Factors and the Chomsky-Foucault debate. 
Noam Chomsky was born December 7, 1928. He is an American theoretical linguist whose work from the 1950s revolutionised the field of linguistics by treating language as a human and biologically based cognitive capacity. His works have also contributed greatly to epistemology, particularly the existence of a priori innate knowledge.

#NoamChomsky #Chomsky #JustWar #Pacifism
